trustfund: TF054586-PHRD-CHINA: RURAL HEALTH PROJECT,TF092906-CHINA RURAL HEALTH PROJECT (BANK-EXECUTED),TF092893-CHINA RURAL HEALTH PROJECT (RECIPIENT-EXECUTED)
theme: Rural services and infrastructure,Health system performance

abstracts.cdata!:
The Rural Health Project for China had a
            satisfactory outcome with low and negligible risk to
            development outcome, moderately satisfactory performance by
            the Bank, and satisfactory performance by the borrower. The
            lessons learned were: (1) the project was able to capitalize
            the existence of a policy environment favorable to rural
            health reform and push the envelope, delving into difficult
            issues such as provider payment and incentives. (2) The
            implementation of a complex reform project in such a large
            number of counties and provinces undermined the
            effectiveness of the project. (3) Capacity building and
            strategic thinking has enhanced the project’s impact and its
            long-term sustainability. (4) The Results Framework should
            include lower level indicators that can be regularly
            monitored using routine data from the management information
            system. (5) By focusing on evaluation, documentation and
            dissemination of experiences, results and lessons learned,
            the project transferred knowledge and fostered a culture of
            evidence-based decision-making.
